content: {"locationId": "4079", "organizationId": "3449", "name": "St. James Food Pantry", "address1": "9640 Kennedy Ave ", "address2": "NW corner Kennedy and 45th St., St. James hall", "city": "Highland", "state": "IN", "zipCode": "46324", "country": null, "phone": "219-924-4220", "phoneExt": "#6", "website": null, "latitude": "41.5379574", "longitude": "-87.4626351", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "CITY:  Griffith, Highland, Munster, Scherreerrville, CITY:  Griffith, Highland, Munster, Scherrerrville, TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  St Jamer Parishners, TOWNSHIP/NEIGHBORHOOD:  St James Parishners", "languages": "English", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "", "notes": " The pantry works on a 4 week schedule. Clients are assigned a Friday to pick up. 1st week clients pick up on the first Friday of  the month. 2nd week clients pick up on the 2nd Friday of the month. 3rd week clients pick up on the 3rd Friday of the month. 4th week clients pick up on the 4th Friday of the month . People who live in Highland, Griffith, Munster and Scherrerville may sign up on a Friday from 9-11 AM. If you live out of our area we can help you with a one time emergency distribution. We will also provide information on food pantrys in your town or city were you can go for help. The Juiy distribution schedule,  : 1st week , July 1 Tuesday, 2nd week July 11 Friday, 3rd week july 18 friday, 4th week, july25 friday  PANTRY WILL BE CLOSED FRIDAY JULY 4", "contactName": "Ed Rosinski", "contactPhone": "219-781-9053", "contactEmail": "thekrayniks@sbcglobal.net", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Curbside Pickup / Drive Through, Lifting / Carrying Assistance, Outdoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Household Products, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 37, "regionName": "Food Bank of Northwest Indiana", "logoBlobNameSmall": "03f27dfc-afdf-416e-87d5-3c967e2e44f9.png", "website": "https://foodbanknwi.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Friday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM", "Friday 9:00 AM-11:00 AM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
